channel.title: Compile Problem!
channel.description:
Okay I've followed almost all the rules for the Compiling Problem and it still doesnt work heres what i have in my compile.
@echo off COLOR 08 title FinalScape Client "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_06in/java.exe" server pause
and it still says
'"C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_0injavac.exe"' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect. Press any key to continue . . .

wat error did the last one come up with?

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting candyscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

item.title: Compile Problem!
item.dc:creator: @Crappyservermaker Crappyservermaker
item.description:
@Crappyservermaker wrote:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

I cant help you any further if that itself doesnt work, sorry

item.title: Compile Problem!
item.dc:creator: @Crappyservermaker Crappyservermaker
item.description:
@Crappyservermaker wrote:

When you edited your compiler, Did you put it the number with the v on it?
(your)

Go to C:

Program Files
java
and look for a folder called jdk, after it should be something like

jdk1.5.0_0(your number)

put that in[br][size=1]Posted at: October 13, 2006, 07:40:08 AM[/size][hr]Or you just need to update java…

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Problem!
item.dc:creator: @Crappyservermaker Crappyservermaker
item.description:
@Crappyservermaker wrote:

Copy and paste this in

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

Replace the numbers as shown with (v) To what your version is, To check go to >C:\ >Program Files > Java
v
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
v
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server

Read full topic
